## schema based on version 2.11.0: ## (.0 is an array element) (* is required) (+ denotes ontology term)

column2: ##An individual who is a subject of mcodepacket.
##A list of alternative identifiers for an individual.
##One of possibly many alternative identifiers for an individual.
##The age or age range of the individual.
##An ontology term specified when more than one organism may be studied. It is advised that codesfrom the NCBI Taxonomy resource are used, e.g. NCBITaxon:9606 for humans.
##Whether a patient's record is in active use.
##One or more conditions that occur with primary condition.
##A genomics report associated with an Individual.
